00017 
00018 class PLBmpBase;
00019 class PLBmp;
00020 
00021 #include "plfilter.h"
00022 
00023 //! Base class for filters that can operate in-place on PLBmpBase objects.
00024 class PLInPlaceFilter : public PLFilter  
00025 {
00026 public:
00027   //!
00028   PLInPlaceFilter();
00029   //!
00030   virtual ~PLInPlaceFilter() = 0;
00031 
00032   //! In-Place Apply. Applies the filter to pBmp. 
00033   virtual void ApplyInPlace(PLBmpBase* pBmp) const = 0;  
00034 
00035   //! In-Place Apply. Simply calls the version for PLBmpBase.
00036   virtual void ApplyInPlace(PLBmp* pBmp) const;  
00037 };
00038 
00039 #endif
